name: ChartPivotOptions
description: Encapsulates the options for the pivot chart.

properties.name: showAxisFieldButtons
properties.description: Represents whether to display axis field buttons on a PivotChart.

properties.name: showLegendFieldButtons
properties.description: Represents whether to display legend field buttons on a PivotChart.

properties.name: showReportFilterFieldButtons
properties.description: Represents whether to display report filter field buttons on a PivotChart.

properties.name: showValueFieldButtons
properties.description: Represents whether to display show value field buttons on a PivotChart.
